author: Richard Hall, Richard Hall
title: Names behind the numbers: The victims of coronavirus
description: The virus has killed more than 2,500 people across the United States
content:
The number of deaths from coronavirus in the United States continues to soar. More than 2,500 people have lost their lives to the deadly virus across the country, and the number is expected to grow exponentially in the coming weeks. 
Lost in the dizzying num… [+5252 chars]
